name: Dark Kadabra

abilities.name: Matter Exchange
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand in order to draw a card. This power can't be used if Dark Kadabra is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.text: Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

flavorText: Some people say that Kadabras are responsible for many of the mysterious events reported in the news.

strengths: Mind Shock ignores Weakness and Resistance

competitiveHistory: Dark Kadabra was primarily used as an evolution step to Dark Alakazam. Matter Exchange provided useful card filtering, letting you cycle through your deck for better cards.

rulings.ruling: Matter Exchange is a 1-for-1 trade - discard 1, draw 1.
